role.argrole: person arg0 causes to get cold

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 而且)) (IP-TPC (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (NN 天)) (VP (VA 冷))) (VP (VV 接送) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 千千))))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 怕) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 再)) (VP (VV 冻到) (NP-OBJ (PN 她)))))))
